text:
:champagne: _You have opened a new, empty shared channel._ 
_Share <https://www.smooz.io/room/5e85af8686e7aa00042448c6|this link> with other teams to invite them in it_
<@U4VR52RQE> has renamed the channel from "z-shared-25" to "eban-and-trent"
name: eban-and-trent

text:
Hey Trent, , please meet Eban your incredible E-Mentor we've been telling you about :smile:. Feel free to introduce yourselves, say a little bit about what you would like to get out of the mentorship and continue chatting within this channel. :wave:

I will now be leaving the channel, but please direct message myself or penny-prospela if you have any questions. All the best for now! :slightly_smiling_face:

Note: You will not see your match as a "member" in this channel however you can see from the chat history that they have joined/been added :smile:

Hey Eban! Thanks so much in advance for being my EMentor. So to tell you a little about me, I went to SCAD and studied animation and graduated in 2018. Since then I went to an internship at a small studio called Millions of Tiny Robots in Atlanta and became a 3D Generalist doing lots of animation, texturing, modeling, some lighting, and lots of work in Unreal. I loved doing that but I felt like I still wanted to work on film/tv, so I soon got accepted to the MPC academy where they trained me and taught me the pipeline to finally starting as a full on animator at Mill Film. 

In Montreal i worked on CATS and another vfx project that so far is not announced. Doing vfx in Montreal was so so so fun but I started to kind of miss being in the US and someone I had once worked with briefly in Atlanta had told me about a previs studio he got put as the supervisor at back in Atlanta and offered to have me on the team. So I wanted to jump on that opportunity as soon as I could. Unfortunately plans changed and projects got shifted so as soon as I got down to Atlanta I was left without any leads. I continued my job search, updated my reel quite a bit, almost got back in a few places, and then this whole virus thing hit at the worst time.

So I think through all of this I’m really just looking for any advice or guidance you may have. I’ll send you my demo reel link if you’d like to take a look as well! For a long time I’ve been trying to think of things to add to it as well but honestly everything going on right now has hit me with a bit of a demoralizing creative slump, so I really will appreciate any and all input you have.
This is my demo reel^ and the password is reel2020
I’d also love to know about you too!
